title: Council Decision of 15 June 2009 appointing one Spanish member and one Spanish alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
17.6.2009 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 137/2
COUNCIL DECISION
of 15 June 2009
appointing one Spanish member and one Spanish alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
2009/C 137/02
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 263 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the Spanish Government,
Whereas:
(1) On 24 January 2006, the Council adopted Decision 2006/116/EC appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2006 to 25 January 2010 (1).
(2) A member's seat on the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the expiry of the mandate of Mr Emilio PÉREZ TOURIŇO. An alternate member's seat has become vacant following the expiry of the mandate of Mr Julio César FERNÁNDEZ MATO,
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed to the Committee of the Regions for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 25 January 2010:
(a) as member:
— Mr Alberto NUŇEZ FEIJOO, Presidente de la Xunta de Galicia, Galicia,
(b) as alternate member:
— Mr Jesús GAMALLO ALLER, Director General de Relaciones Exteriores y con la Unión Europea, Galicia,
This Decision shall take effect on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 15 June 2009.
For the Council
The President
J. ŠEBESTA
(1)  OJ L 56, 25.2.2006, p. 75.
